result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sandra J Koziol

defendant.name: Koziol, Sandra J
defendant.address: 110 East Van Buren Street, Port Washington, WI 53074

records.addlTxt:
Email correspondence with parties. Attorney Hall informs court that she is in trial on another matter and is unavailable for today's hearing. Case is re-scheduled for a plea hearing on 11/17/2022 at 10:00 am, before Br 16.
Plea hearing scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Sandra J Koziol appeared by video, in custody in Taycheedah Correctional.  Attorney Jade K Hall appeared by video for Sandra J Koziol.  Prosecuting attorney Abby Rockendorf appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 16, Judge Grayson. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Defense requests a plea/sentencing date. Branch is down. Case is adjourned to Br. 16.
Scheduling conference scheduled for September 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver.  Received and Filed.  nk
Received and Filed. Public Defender Order Appointing Counsel

Defendant Sandra J Koziol not in court, defendant in custody at Taycheedah Correctional.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. State's Witness is present. SPD failed to appoint counsel. Court orders case adjourned for CAUSE for Status of Counsel.  Status conference scheduled for September 2, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Court ordered Defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Sandra J Koziol in court with attorney Patrick Dennis Wait.  Defendant Sandra J Koziol in custody at Taycheedah Correctional.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sandra J Koziol appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Grayson, Branch 16. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL. 
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Letter from Defendant ( Sandra Koziol # 703362 Taycheedah Correctional Institution  701 CO RD K ,Fond Du Lac, WI 54937)
